:)<\/p>"},"editorContent":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":1},"content":[{"text":"For the Next Generation of Publishers.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Whether its a personal blog or a 100-writer publishing group, Storipress brings content, design and editorial teams together. Discover the best publishing platform ever.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"asd fjksadf asdf","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph"},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":1},"content":[{"text":"Enough of this sheet.\u00a0Organise and manage your editorial\u00a02x faster.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Currently fighting with 5 different tools to manage your publishing Workflow? Storipress integrates all tools a publisher needs into a central platform \u2014 one change updates all systems. Storipress is your new single source of truth.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":2},"content":[{"text":"Advanced editorial workflow","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Free yourself from workflow hell. In Storipress, all unpublished articles are shown on a kanban board of drafts, reviewed, and scheduled; giving you full visibility of","type":"text"},{"text":" your production pipeline and who's responsible for what.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph"},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":2},"content":[{"text":"Schedule with context on a full page calendar","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Scheduling content without historical context is like driving blind. Storipress shows all your articles on calendar, allowing you to see everything published in the past and future, enabling better content strategy and organisation. CMS\u00a0Editorial Workflow, perfected.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":3},"content":[{"text":"Article stage workflow colour coding","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"hardBreak","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Articles are colour coded by stage:\u00a0orange is draft, blue is 'for editor review', and green is 'reviewed or published' for instant visualisation of your team's workflow.","type":"text"},{"type":"hardBreak"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":3},"content":[{"text":"Integrate anything","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"hardBreak","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Add custom code to your site\u2019s header and footer to connect Google and Facebook analytics. Additionally, connect your Mailchimp to build loyal subscribers.","type":"text"},{"type":"hardBreak"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Individual desk permissions","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"hardBreak","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"In Storipress, articles are organised into \u2018newsdesks\u2019 or content categories, with their own individualised user permissions. Ensure people only edit what they should.","type":"text"},{"type":"hardBreak"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Powerful search and filter","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"hardBreak","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Have 50,000 articles? Forget fiddling around with search that misses queries or is overly complex. Storipress' unibar search function deals with massive content catalogues to find you anything, instantly.","type":"text"},{"type":"hardBreak"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Perfect SEO \u2014 without plugins","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"hardBreak","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Storipress has all the fundamental technical modern SEO features built in. Metadata controls, automatic XML sitemaps, RPC pings, robots.txt + more \u2014 no plugins necessary.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"awesome!","type":"text"},{"type":"hardBreak"}]},{"type":"paragraph"},{"type":"paragraph"},{"type":"paragraph"}]}}

{"styles":{"name":"article","styles":[],"children":{"article-title":{"meta":{"dirty":{"fontFamily":"lg"}},"name":"article-title","styles":{"fontFamily":{"lg":"Jost","md":"Jost","xs":"Jost"}},"children":[]},"article-content":{"name":"article-content","styles":[],"children":{"& .main-content p":{"meta":{"dirty":{"fontFamily":"lg"}},"name":"& .main-content p","styles":{"fontFamily":{"lg":"Jost","md":"Jost","xs":"Jost"}},"children":[]},"& .main-content h1":{"meta":{"dirty":{"underline":"lg","fontFamily":"lg"}},"name":"& .main-content h1","styles":{"underline":{"lg":false,"md":false,"xs":false},"fontFamily":{"lg":"Jost","md":"Jost","xs":"Jost"}},"children":[]},"& .main-content h2":{"meta":{"dirty":{"fontFamily":"lg"}},"name":"& .main-content h2","styles":{"fontFamily":{"lg":"Jost","md":"Jost","xs":"Jost"}},"children":[]}}}}},"elements":{"dropcap":"none","blockquote":"regular"},"template":"other-page-nophoto","templateData":{"title":"Privacy Policy"},"editorContent":{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"This Privacy Policy describes how your personal information is collected, used, and shared when you visit [","type":"text"},{"text":"Site URL","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"},{"type":"underline"}]},{"text":"] (the \u201cSite\u201d).","type":"text"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":1},"content":[{"text":"PERSONAL INFORMATION WE COLLECT","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"When you visit the Site, we automatically collect certain information about your device, including information about your web browser, IP address, time zone, and some of the cookies that are installed on your device. Additionally, as you browse the Site, we collect information about the individual web pages or products that you view, what websites or search terms referred you to the Site, and information about how you interact with the Site. We refer to this automatically-collected information as \u201cDevice Information.\u201d","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"We collect Device Information using the following technologies:","type":"text"}]},{"type":"bulletList","attrs":{"type":"bullet"},"content":[{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"\u201cCookies\u201d are data files that are placed on your device or computer and often include an anonymous unique identifier. For more information about cookies, and how to disable cookies, visit ","type":"text"},{"text":"http:\/\/www.allaboutcookies.org","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"http:\/\/www.allaboutcookies.org","target":"_blank"}},{"type":"underline"}]},{"text":".","type":"text"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"\u201cLog files\u201d track actions occurring on the Site, and collect data including your IP address, browser type, Internet service provider, referring\/exit pages, and date\/time stamps.","type":"text"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"\u201cWeb beacons,\u201d \u201ctags,\u201d and \u201cpixels\u201d are electronic files used to record information about how you browse the Site.","type":"text"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"[[INSERT DESCRIPTIONS OF OTHER TYPES OF TRACKING TECHNOLOGIES USED]]","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"},{"type":"underline"}]}]}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Additionally when you subscribe to our mailing list through the Site, we collect certain information from you, including your name, email address, and phone number.\u00a0 We refer to this information as \u201cSubscriber Information.\u201d","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"[[INSERT ANY OTHER INFORMATION YOU COLLECT:\u00a0 OFFLINE DATA, PURCHASED MARKETING DATA\/LISTS]]","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"},{"type":"underline"}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"When we talk about \u201cPersonal Information\u201d in this Privacy Policy, we are talking both about Device Information and Subscriber Information.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":1},"content":[{"text":"HOW DO WE USE YOUR PERSONAL INFORMATION?","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"We use the Subscriber Information that we collect generally to notify you of any additional content we post. Additionally, we use this Subscriber Information to:","type":"text"}]},{"type":"bulletList","attrs":{"type":"bullet"},"content":[{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Communicate with you;","type":"text"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Screen our subscribers for potential risk or fraud; and","type":"text"}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Provide you with information or advertising relating to our products or services.","type":"text"}]}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"We use the Device Information that we collect to help us screen for potential risk and fraud (in particular, your IP address), and more generally to improve and optimise our Site (for example, by generating analytics about how our customers browse and interact with the Site, and to assess the success of our marketing and advertising campaigns). We may also use your device information to send you targeted advertising on our site.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"We share your Personal Information with third parties to help us use your Personal Information, as described above.\u00a0 For example, we use Storipress to power our online publication--you can read more about how Storipress uses your Personal Information here:\u00a0 ","type":"text"},{"text":"https:\/\/storipress.com\/legal\/global-privacy-policy.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https:\/\/storipress.com\/legal\/global-privacy-policy.","target":"_blank"}}]},{"text":"\u00a0 ","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"We also use Google Analytics to help us understand how our customers use the Site--you can read more about how Google uses your Personal Information here:\u00a0 ","type":"text"},{"text":"https:\/\/www.google.com\/intl\/en\/policies\/privacy\/.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https:\/\/www.google.com\/intl\/en\/policies\/privacy\/.","target":"_blank"}}]},{"text":"\u00a0 ","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"You can also opt-out of Google Analytics here:\u00a0 ","type":"text"},{"text":"https:\/\/tools.google.com\/dlpage\/gaoptout.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https:\/\/tools.google.com\/dlpage\/gaoptout.","target":"_blank"}}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Finally, we may also share your Personal Information to comply with applicable laws and regulations, to respond to a subpoena, search warrant or other lawful request for information we receive, or to otherwise protect our rights.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":1},"content":[{"text":"BEHAVIOURAL ADVERTISING","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"As described above, we use your Personal Information to provide you with targeted advertisements or marketing communications we believe may be of interest to you.\u00a0 For more information about how targeted advertising works, you can visit the Network Advertising Initiative\u2019s (\u201cNAI\u201d) educational page at ","type":"text"},{"text":"http:\/\/www.networkadvertising.org\/understanding-online-advertising\/how-does-it-work.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"http:\/\/www.networkadvertising.org\/understanding-online-advertising\/how-does-it-work.","target":"_blank"}}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"You can opt out of targeted advertising by:","type":"text"}]},{"type":"bulletList","attrs":{"type":"dash"},"content":[{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"FACEBOOK - ","type":"text"},{"text":"https:\/\/www.facebook.com\/settings\/?tab=ads","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https:\/\/www.facebook.com\/settings\/?tab=ads","target":"_blank"}}]}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"GOOGLE - ","type":"text"},{"text":"https:\/\/www.google.com\/settings\/ads\/anonymous","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https:\/\/www.google.com\/settings\/ads\/anonymous","target":"_blank"}}]}]}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"BING - ","type":"text"},{"text":"https:\/\/advertise.bingads.microsoft.com\/en-us\/resources\/policies\/personalized-ads","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"https:\/\/advertise.bingads.microsoft.com\/en-us\/resources\/policies\/personalized-ads","target":"_blank"}}]}]}]}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Additionally, you can opt out of some of these services by visiting the Digital Advertising Alliance\u2019s opt-out portal at:\u00a0 ","type":"text"},{"text":"http:\/\/optout.aboutads.info\/.","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"link","attrs":{"href":"http:\/\/optout.aboutads.info\/.","target":"_blank"}}]}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":1},"content":[{"text":"DO NOT TRACK","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Please note that we do not alter our Site\u2019s data collection and use practices when we see a Do Not Track signal from your browser.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":1},"content":[{"text":"YOUR RIGHTS","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"If you are a European resident, you have the right to access personal information we hold about you and to ask that your personal information be corrected, updated, or deleted. If you would like to exercise this right, please contact us through the contact information below.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"Additionally, if you are a European resident we note that we are processing your information in order to fulfil contracts we might have with you (for example if you make an order through the Site), or otherwise to pursue our legitimate business interests listed above.\u00a0 Additionally, please note that your information will be transferred outside of Europe, including to Canada and the United States.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":1},"content":[{"text":"DATA RETENTION","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"When you place an order through the Site, we will maintain your Subscriber Information for our records unless and until you ask us to delete this information.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":1},"content":[{"text":"CHANGES","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"We may update this privacy policy from time to time in order to reflect, for example, changes to our practices or for other operational, legal or regulatory reasons.","type":"text"}]},{"type":"heading","attrs":{"level":1},"content":[{"text":"CONTACT US","type":"text"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"For more information about our privacy practices, if you have questions, or if you would like to make a complaint, please contact us by e-mail at ","type":"text"},{"text":"[YOUR PUBLICATION'S EMAIL]","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"},{"type":"underline"}]},{"text":" or by mail using the details provided below:","type":"text"},{"type":"hardBreak"}]},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"text":"[YOUR PUBLICATION'S ADDRESS]","type":"text","marks":[{"type":"bold"},{"type":"underline"}]}]}]}}
